template.name: accelerometerSensor
template.value: $COMMENT$ new net.happybrackets.device.sensors.AccelerometerListener(hb) {@java.lang.Override public void sensorUpdated(float x_val, float y_val, float z_val) { $COMMENT_LINE_TOP$ $END$ $COMMENT_LINE_BOTTOM$ } };// End accelerometerSensor
template.description: Inserts an accelerometer sensor listener

variable.name: COMMENT
variable.defaultValue: "// type accelerometerSensor to create this. Values typically range from -1 to + 1 "

variable.name: COMMENT_LINE_TOP
variable.defaultValue: "// Write your code below this line "

variable.name: COMMENT_LINE_BOTTOM
variable.defaultValue: "// Write your code above this line"

template.name: textControlSender
template.value: $COMMENT$ net.happybrackets.core.control.TextControl $CONTROL_NAME$ = new net.happybrackets.core.control.TextControl(this, "$NAME$", "$INIT_VALUE$");
template.description: Creates a send only string type DynamicControl that displays as a text box

variable.name: COMMENT
variable.defaultValue: "// Type textControlSender to generate this code "

variable.name: NAME
variable.defaultValue: "control name"

template.name: globalTextControlSender
template.value: $COMMENT$ net.happybrackets.core.control.TextControl $CONTROL_NAME$ = new net.happybrackets.core.control.TextControl(this, "$NAME$", "$INIT_VALUE$").setControlScope(net.happybrackets.core.control.ControlScope.GLOBAL);
template.description: Creates a global send only string type DynamicControl that displays as a text box

variable.name: COMMENT
variable.defaultValue: "// Type globalTextControlSender to generate this code "

variable.name: NAME
variable.defaultValue: "control name"

template.name: booleanControlSender
template.value: // Type booleanControlSender to generate this code net.happybrackets.core.control.BooleanControl $CONTROL_NAME$ = new net.happybrackets.core.control.BooleanControlSender(this, "$NAME$", $INIT_VALUE$);
template.description: Creates a send only Boolean type DynamicControl that displays as a check box

variable.name: NAME
variable.defaultValue: "control name"

template.name: globalBooleanControlSender
template.value: $COMMENT$ net.happybrackets.core.control.BooleanControl $CONTROL_NAME$ = new net.happybrackets.core.control.BooleanControl(this, "$NAME$", $INIT_VALUE$).setControlScope(net.happybrackets.core.control.ControlScope.GLOBAL);
template.description: Creates a global send only Boolean type DynamicControl that displays as a check box

variable.name: COMMENT
variable.defaultValue: "// Type globalBooleanControlSender to generate this code "

variable.name: NAME
variable.defaultValue: "control name"

template.description: Creates a global send only global trigger DynamicControl

variable.name: COMMENT

variable.name: NAME
variable.defaultValue: "global control name"

template.name: threadFunction

variable.defaultValue: "// remove the break below to just resume thread or add your own action "

variable.name: BREAK2
variable.defaultValue: ?// remove the break above to just resume thread or add your own action "

variable.name: PRESTART1
variable.defaultValue: "// write your code you want to execute before you start the thread below this line "

variable.name: PRESTART2
variable.defaultValue: "// write your code you want to execute before you start the thread above this line "

template.name: classObjectControlSender
template.value: $COMMENT$ net.happybrackets.core.control.ClassObjectControl $CONTROL_NAME$ = new net.happybrackets.core.control.ClassObjectControlSender(this, "$NAME$", $CLASS$.class);
